title: Wakefit's Rs 1,300-crore IPO to open on December 8
description: The IPO comprises a fresh issue of equity shares aggregating up to ₹377 crore and an OFS of 4.67 crore shares by existing investors. Axis Capital, IIFL Capital Services, and Nomura Financial Advisory are the book-running lead managers to the issue.

author: ET Bureau
text_for_sentiment: Wakefit's Rs 1,300-crore IPO to open on December 8 The IPO comprises a fresh issue of equity shares aggregating up to ₹377 crore and an OFS of 4.67 crore shares by existing investors. Axis Capital, IIFL Capital Services, and Nomura Financial Advisory are the book-running lead managers to the issue.
